page.title: 06THE GARAGE
page.content: R & D motors is the only garage in the village which services cars.They also repair vans.They open at 8.00a.m.and close at 5.30 p.m. There are seven people who work in the garage . They have a full range of tools which can be used for servicing the cars or for repairing cars which have been damaged in accidents.They have hydraulic tools and an airsander for repairing damaged vehicles. They also operate a taxi service which is used to bring the children to the Richard Clarke School from the outlying farms and district. They also operate a bus service using the same vehicle, to carry people into Uttoxeter.
